description: Replace septic systems located on Rouge National Urban Park
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Invitation to Qualify
Parks Canada Agency is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the Stage 2 - Septic Tank Replacement, Rouge National Urban Park project.
#### Contract Information

| **Contract Details** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | cb-692-66992418 |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-12-21 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2024-01-16 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2023-12-15 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2024-07-01 |

#### Project Overview

Parks Canada Agency requires the services of a licensed Sewage System Installer to replace the septic systems at four locations:

* 4715 York Durham Line, Pickering, ON L1Y 1A3
* 9992 York Durham Line, Markham, ON L6B 1A8
* 5090 Sideline 30, Pickering, ON L1Y 0A4
* 8 Beare Rd, Scarborough, ON M1X 1P6

The project involves a two-stage selection process:

* Stage 1: Evaluation of qualified suppliers
* Stage 2: Invitation to qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid

#### Eligibility

Qualified suppliers must have the necessary experience and licensure to perform the required services.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Cloë Pelland Tessier
 Parks Canada Agency
 Phone: (418) 928-7252
 Fax: 855-983-1808
 Email: [cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca](mailto:cloe.pelland-tessier@pc.gc.ca)

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Agreement.

#### Region of Opportunity

The project will be carried out in Canada, specifically in the province of Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).баофифиатаюк
